Reviews.Title: Stay away
Reviews.Author: Suri
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for about a 1.5 years. I don't recall my calls being dropped but what Iv'e had a major problem is with memory! I have 0 apps downloaded, about 50 pictures, 400 texts and I find myself making memory for this messed up phone at least 3 times a day. Battery used to be fine, but I now have to charge it a minimum of 2 times a day (depends on my daily activity). I would not recommend this phone to anyone who likes to download apps, watch videos,etc. Perhaps this phone is ideal to those individuals who want to learn how to use a touch screen or upgrade from a flip phone, whatever the case is.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: helga
Reviews.Content: This phone is not good. I got it 3 months ago it started acting up after a week has short battery life drops calls speaker sounds horrible like am station its an expensive product for what it renders stay away.from this phone!

Reviews.Title: P.O.S
Reviews.Author: cmiller12
Reviews.Content: I got this phone from Tmobile back in October 2011 and ever since I got it messes up. It turns it self off the battery lasts for a whole 5 hours before it needs charging and it drops my calls and wont send txt messages. I would personally not reccomend this phone to anyone I cant wait to get a new phone! This phone sucks!
